dt: {bc}a Texas unit of length equal to 33.33 inches (84.66 centimeters)

et: borrowed from American Spanish, from Spanish, "pole," going back to Latin {it}vāra{/it} "any of various branched structures or implements," noun derivative from feminine of {it}vārus{/it} "bent outwards with converging extremities, bow-legged," of uncertain origin
shortdef: a Texas unit of length equal to 33.33 inches (84.66 centimeters)
